especialidades.title: Our Mediterranean Rice Dishes
especialidades.description: Each rice dish is a culinary work of art prepared with fresh Mediterranean ingredients and Catalan gastronomic tradition

experiencia.title: Paellas by the Sea
experiencia.description: Enjoy our Mediterranean rice dishes on our terrace with panoramic sea views. A unique gastronomic experience on the beachfront.

cta.title: Book Your Table for Rice Dishes
cta.description: The best Mediterranean rice dishes of Costa del Maresme await you on our terrace facing the sea
